VEvil.​Core.​ResourceFetcher
public static
VEvil.​Core.​ResourceFetcher

This class allow to fetch ScriptableObject files at runtime.  The files fetched should only be used to read content in order to avoid GameData modifications at runtime.

Functions
GetResourceFilesFromType
public static T[] GetResourceFilesFromType<T>()
where T : Object

Scan through every files in the Resources/ folder and returns the files from the type asked.

Type Parameter
T

File type.

GetResourceFileFromTypeWithIndex
public static T GetResourceFileFromTypeWithIndex<T>(
int 
_index
)
where T : Object

Scan through every files in the Resources/ folder and returns the file at a specific index from the list of files found.

Type Parameter
T

File type.

GetResourceFileFromType
public static T GetResourceFileFromType<T>()
where T : Object

Scan through every files in the Resources/ folder and returns the file from the type asked.

Type Parameter
T

File type.
